abstract: California lawmakers overwhelmingly approved a compromise bill giving Amazon.com a one-year reprieve from having to collect a sales tax from its customers in the state.
snippet: California lawmakers overwhelmingly approved a compromise bill giving Amazon.com a one-year reprieve from having to collect a sales tax from its customers in the state.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — California lawmakers overwhelmingly approved a compromise bill Friday night giving Amazon.com a one-year reprieve from having to collect a sales tax from its customers in the state.

headline.main: California Lawmakers Give Amazon Tax Reprieve
headline.print_headline: California Lawmakers Give Amazon Tax Reprieve
